about.intro: We're building the future of web analytics: privacy-first, open source, and designed for the modern web. No more choosing between powerful insights and respecting your visitors' privacy.

howWeStarted.title: How We Started
howWeStarted.p1: Betterlytics was born out of real frustration. Our team was developing a Vendor Management System when we hit a wall with web analytics. Every solution we evaluated forced us into the same impossible choice: either compromise our users' privacy or settle for inadequate insights.
howWeStarted.p2: Traditional analytics tools force you to choose between comprehensive insights and user privacy. We believe that's a false choice. Betterlytics proves you can have powerful, actionable analytics while being completely privacy-compliant and respectful of your visitors.
howWeStarted.p3: What started as a solution for our own needs became something much bigger: a mission to build analytics tools that respect both website owners and their visitors. Every feature is designed with privacy and performance as equal priorities.

whyPrivacyFirst.title: Why Privacy-First Analytics Matter
whyPrivacyFirst.p1: The web analytics industry has been dominated by surveillance capitalism for too long. Major analytics providers collect vast amounts of personal data, track users across websites, and use this information to build detailed behavioral profiles for advertising purposes.
whyPrivacyFirst.p2: We don't believe website owners should have to compromise their visitors' privacy to understand how their site performs. Betterlytics collects only the essential metrics you need: no cookies, no personal data, no cross-site tracking. Your visitors' privacy is respected by default.

builtInOpen.title: Built in the Open
builtInOpen.p1: Betterlytics is completely open source under the AGPL-3.0 license. This isn't just about transparency, it's about accountability. Anyone can inspect our code, verify our privacy claims, and contribute to making the platform better.
builtInOpen.p2: Open source also means freedom. You can self-host Betterlytics on your own infrastructure, ensuring complete control over your data. No vendor lock-in, no surprise policy changes, no sudden price increases.

privacyPerformance.title: Privacy and Performance in Perfect Balance
privacyPerformance.p1: We obsess over both privacy and performance equally because your website's speed matters just as much as your visitors' privacy. Our tracking script weighs less than 2KB. Compare that to Google Analytics' bloated 45KB+ payload. Built with modern web standards and optimized for speed, Betterlytics won't slow down your site.
privacyPerformance.p2: Under the hood, we use cutting-edge technology: Rust for high-performance data processing, ClickHouse for lightning-fast analytical queries, and Next.js 15 for a modern, responsive dashboard experience. Every technical decision prioritizes both user privacy and system performance.

builtForEveryone.title: Built for Everyone
builtForEveryone.p1: Whether you're running a personal blog, a growing SaaS platform, an e-commerce store, or an enterprise website, Betterlytics is designed to meet your needs. We understand that different organizations have different requirements, from simple traffic insights to complex user journey analysis.
builtForEveryone.p2: Integration takes minutes, not hours. Our dashboard is intuitive and well-documented, showing you what you need to know without drowning you in unnecessary complexity. While we don't have a public API yet, every dashboard feature is thoroughly documented to help you get the most out of your analytics.

privacyRegulations.title: Privacy Regulations Made Simple
privacyRegulations.p1: GDPR, CCPA, PECR compliant. Privacy regulations shouldn't be a compliance nightmare. Because Betterlytics doesn't collect personal data or use cookies, you're compliant by default. No cookie banners required, no consent management needed.
privacyRegulations.p2: This simplicity extends to your users too. They can focus on your content instead of being interrupted by privacy notices and consent forms. Better experience for everyone.
privacyRegulations.p3Prefix: We're based in the European Union and all data processing occurs within EU boundaries. Your data never leaves the EU, ensuring full compliance with GDPR requirements. For detailed information about how we handle your data, see our

communityDriven.title: Community-Driven Development
communityDriven.p1: Betterlytics grows through community feedback and contributions. We listen to developers, implement requested features, and maintain the platform based on real user needs; not investor demands or advertising revenue requirements. We want to deeply thank our community for their feedback and contributions.
communityDriven.p2: Our sustainable business model means we can focus on building the best analytics platform possible. We're funded by our users, not by selling their data. This alignment of incentives ensures we'll always prioritize privacy and performance and never compromise on either.

future.title: The Future of Web Analytics
future.quote: We believe businesses should be able to understand their audience without sacrificing privacy or making needless compromises on ethics. Analytics can be both powerful and respectful by design.
future.p1: This vision drives everything we build. Every feature, every optimization, every decision is guided by our commitment to privacy-first analytics that everyone can trust and use.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.lead: Join the growing community of businesses who refuse to compromise on privacy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: Questions about Betterlytics? Need support with your analytics setup? Our team is ready to assist you.

getInTouch.title: Get in Touch
getInTouch.description: Whether you need technical support, have questions about our features, or want to discuss enterprise solutions, we're here to help. Choose the method that works best for you:

integrate.question: How do I integrate Betterlytics with my website?
integrate.answer: Integration is simple! Just add our lightweight script tag to your website or install our NPM package. Check our documentation for detailed setup guides for all major frameworks.

gdpr.question: Is Betterlytics really GDPR compliant?
gdpr.answer: Yes, absolutely! We don't use cookies, don't collect personal data, and all data processing is done in compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other privacy regulations.

migrate.question: Can I migrate from Google Analytics?
migrate.answer: Not yet! But we're working hard to implement this feature and will provide a migration guide and tools to help you transition from Google Analytics.

freePlan.question: What's included in the free plan?
freePlan.answer: The free self-hosted plan includes up to 10,000 tracked events, full dashboard access and community support. Perfect for getting started! No credit card required, no strings attached.

cloud.question: How does the cloud hosting work?
cloud.answer: Our cloud hosting provides a fully managed Betterlytics instance with automatic updates, backups, and 99.9% uptime SLA. No server management required!

support.question: Do you offer support for self-hosted instances?
support.answer: Partially! We provide community support through GitHub and Discord for self-hosted instances, but our priority is to support our cloud hosting customers.

cta.lead: Can't find what you're looking for?

tldr.title: TL;DR
tldr.body: For website visitors, we do not use cookies and we do not collect any personal data. If you decide to create an account, we ask for the bare minimum and only share it with services that are absolutely necessary for the app to function.

scope.title: Scope of This Policy
scope.body: This privacy policy applies exclusively to the Betterlytics hosted cloud service available at betterlytics.io and our official domains. It does not apply to self-hosted installations of our open source software. If you self-host Betterlytics, you are responsible for your own privacy policy, data processing practices, and legal compliance.

intro.p1: At Betterlytics, we are committed to complying with GDPR, CCPA, PECR and other privacy regulations. The privacy of your data â€” and it is your data, not ours! â€” is a big deal to us. We are based in the European Union and all data processing occurs within EU boundaries.
intro.p2: In this policy, we lay out what data we collect and why, how your data is handled and your rights to your data. We promise we never sell your data: never have, never will.

visitor.title: As a visitor to websites using Betterlytics
visitor.lead: The privacy of website visitors is important to us. We have designed our analytics system to be completely cookieless and privacy-focused. As a visitor to websites using Betterlytics:
visitor.li2: No cookies are stored in your browser
visitor.li3: No information is shared with, sent to or sold to third-parties
visitor.li4: No information is shared with advertising companies
visitor.li5: No information is mined and harvested for personal and behavioral trends
visitor.li7: All data collected is aggregated and anonymized

anonymous.title: What anonymous data we collect and why

pageViews.title: Page Views and Navigation
pageViews.body: We track which pages are visited and navigation patterns to help website owners understand how their content is being consumed. We collect the URL path (without query parameters to prevent accidental tracking of sensitive data) and referrer information.

deviceBrowser.title: Device and Browser Information
deviceBrowser.body: We parse the user agent string to determine browser type, operating system, and device category (mobile, tablet, desktop, laptop). Screen resolution is bucketed into categories (small, medium, large) rather than storing exact dimensions.

geographic.title: Geographic Information
geographic.body: We determine the visitor's country from their IP address using a GeoIP database. The IP address itself is immediately anonymized by removing the last octet (IPv4) or using only the first 64 bits (IPv6) before any processing.

anonymousId.title: Anonymous Visitor Identification
anonymousId.body: We generate an anonymous visitor fingerprint using a cryptographic hash of the anonymized IP address, bucketed screen resolution, browser name, and a daily rotating salt. This allows us to count unique visitors without tracking individuals. The fingerprint changes daily, ensuring long-term anonymity.

sessionTracking.title: Session Tracking
sessionTracking.body: We track sessions to understand how visitors engage with websites. Sessions automatically expire after 30 minutes of inactivity and are stored only in server memory, never in cookies or browser storage.

processStore.title: How we process and store data
processStore.li1: EU-based hosting: All data is processed and stored on servers located within the European Union, ensuring GDPR compliance.
processStore.li2: Immediate anonymization: IP addresses are anonymized immediately upon receipt, before any processing or storage occurs.
processStore.li3: No cross-site tracking: Each website's data is isolated and tracked separately with unique site identifiers.
processStore.li4: Aggregated reporting: All analytics reports show aggregated data only, with no ability to identify individual visitors.
processStore.li5: Daily fingerprint rotation: Visitor fingerprints change daily, preventing long-term tracking of individuals.

customer.title: As a customer and subscriber of Betterlytics
customer.lead: Our guiding principle is to collect only what we need and process this information solely to provide you with the service you signed up for.

whatWeCollect.title: What we collect and why
whatWeCollect.email: Email address: Required to create an account, send you essential service communications, and provide customer support.
whatWeCollect.auth: Authentication data: Secure session tokens to keep you logged in to your dashboard.
whatWeCollect.websiteConfig: Website configuration: Domain names and site settings you configure for your analytics tracking.
whatWeCollect.usage: Usage data: How you use our dashboard to improve our service and provide support.

thirdParty.title: Third-party services
thirdParty.intro: We use a select number of trusted, EU-based service providers:
thirdParty.li1: Payment processing (if applicable) through EU-compliant payment processors
thirdParty.li2: Email delivery for transactional emails and notifications
thirdParty.outro: We only share the minimum necessary information with these providers and contractually bind them to protect your data according to GDPR standards.

dataRetention.title: Data retention
dataRetention.li1: Account deletion: When you delete your account, ALL data is permanently deleted immediately - this includes your personal data (email, payment information, account settings) AND all website analytics data. No exceptions, no retention period.
dataRetention.li2: Subscription cancellation (without account deletion): If you cancel your subscription but keep your account, we retain your analytics data for up to 1 month in case you decide to reactivate, after which it is permanently deleted.
dataRetention.li3: Session data: Visitor sessions are stored only in server memory and automatically expire after 30 minutes of inactivity.
dataRetention.footer: You always have the right to immediate deletion of all data.

rights.title: Your rights under GDPR
rights.intro: As a data subject under GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights.li1: Right of access: Request a copy of your personal data
rights.li2: Right to rectification: Correct inaccurate personal data
rights.li3: Right to erasure: Request deletion of your personal data
rights.li4: Right to restrict processing: Limit how we use your data
rights.li5: Right to data portability: Receive your data in a portable format
rights.li6: Right to object: Object to processing based on legitimate interests
rights.li7: Right to withdraw consent: Withdraw consent for data processing
rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at privacy@betterlytics.io

noCookies.title: No cookies policy
noCookies.body: Betterlytics does not use any cookies for tracking website visitors. We achieve all necessary analytics functionality through cookieless, server-side processing. This means websites using Betterlytics do not need to display cookie consent banners for our analytics tracking.

security.title: Data security
security.li1: All data transmission is encrypted using TLS 1.3
security.li2: Data at rest is encrypted using industry-standard encryption
security.li3: Access to data is strictly limited to authorized personnel
security.li4: All servers are located in secure EU data centers

changes.title: Changes to this privacy policy
changes.body: We may update this policy as needed to comply with relevant regulations and reflect any new practices. Whenever we make significant changes to our policies, we will notify our customers via email and announce them on our website.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.lead: If you have any questions, comments, or concerns about this privacy policy, your data, or your rights with respect to your information, please contact us:
contact.footer1: ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡º Made and hosted in the European Union
contact.footer2: Committed to privacy, transparency, and GDPR compliance

scope.title: Scope of These Terms
scope.body: These Terms of Service apply exclusively to the Betterlytics hosted cloud service available at betterlytics.io and our official domains. They do not apply to self-hosted installations of our open source software. If you self-host Betterlytics, you are responsible for your own terms of service, data processing, and legal compliance.

intro.p1: Thank you for using Betterlytics! When we say "company", "we", "our", "us", "service" or "services" in this document, we are referring to Betterlytics and our privacy-focused web analytics platform.
intro.p2: We may update these Terms of Service in the future. Whenever we make significant changes to our policies, we will notify our customers via email and announce them on our website. When you use our service, now or in the future, you are agreeing to the latest Terms of Service.
intro.p3: If you do not agree to these Terms of Service, do not use this service. Violation of any of the terms below may result in the termination of your account.

account.title: Account Terms
account.li1: Security responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and password. Betterlytics cannot and will not be liable for any loss or damage from your failure to comply with this security obligation.
account.li2: Account activity: You are responsible for any activity that occurs under your account, including activity by team members you invite to your account.
account.li3: Legal compliance: You may not use our service for any illegal purpose or to violate any laws in your jurisdiction.
account.li4: Registration requirements: You must provide a valid email address to complete the signup process. You must be a human - accounts registered by bots or automated methods are not permitted.
account.li5: Website ownership: You must own or have explicit permission to install our analytics script on any website you track with Betterlytics.
account.li6: Data accuracy: You agree to provide accurate information about your websites and not to intentionally send false or misleading data to our service.
account.li7: Age requirements: You must be at least 18 years old to use our service. If you are between 13-17, you may use our service only with parental consent.

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.intro: Betterlytics is designed for legitimate website analytics and is built as an open source project for transparency. You agree not to use our service to:
acceptableUse.li1: Track visitors without their knowledge or in violation of privacy laws
acceptableUse.li2: Collect personally identifiable information (our system is designed to prevent this)
acceptableUse.li3: Generate artificial or bot traffic to inflate statistics or abuse our infrastructure
acceptableUse.li4: Track websites you don't own without explicit permission
acceptableUse.li5: Abuse our service infrastructure, bypass rate limits, or send malformed data that could harm our systems
acceptableUse.li6: Use our service to harm, harass, or violate the privacy of any individual
acceptableUse.li7: Violate any applicable laws, including GDPR, CCPA, or other privacy regulations

payment.title: Payment, Refunds, and Plan Changes
payment.freeTierBody: We offer a permanently free tier with a monthly event limit as specified on our pricing page. No credit card is required for the free tier. We do not sell your data - ever, regardless of which plan you use.
payment.billingBody: You can use our free tier indefinitely within the monthly event limits. For higher usage, you need to upgrade to a paid plan and pay in advance. If you exceed plan limits without upgrading, you risk losing excess data. If paid accounts become overdue, we will freeze the account until payment is made.
payment.limitsBody: Each plan includes a monthly limit of events (pageviews, custom events, etc.). Unused events do not roll over to the next month. You will never be charged extra for occasional traffic spikes. If you consistently exceed your plan limits for two consecutive months, we will contact you to discuss upgrading.
payment.planChangesBody: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Upgrades take effect immediately. Downgrading may result in loss of features or capacity. We do not accept liability for any data loss resulting from plan downgrades.
payment.refundsBody: All fees are non-refundable. However, if you experience significant service issues within the first 30 days, please contact us and we'll work with you to find a fair solution.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Termination
cancellation.li1: Subscription cancellation: Keeps your account but stops billing. Analytics data retained for 1 month.
cancellation.li2: Account deletion: Permanently deletes everything immediately, including all analytics data.
cancellation.howToBody: You can cancel your subscription or delete your account entirely through your account settings. An email request alone is not considered proper cancellation.
cancellation.whLi1: Subscription cancellation: Your cancellation takes effect at the end of your current billing period. You won't be charged again. Your analytics data becomes inaccessible but is retained for 1 month in case you return, then permanently deleted.
cancellation.whLi2: Account deletion: All data (personal and analytics) is permanently deleted immediately. This cannot be undone.
cancellation.ourRightBody: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account for violation of these terms, illegal activity, or abuse of our service or team members. We will provide notice when possible, but immediate termination may be necessary in severe cases.

serviceMods.title: Service Modifications and Pricing
serviceMods.li1: Service changes: We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any part of the service with or without notice. We will communicate significant changes affecting your usage in advance when possible.
serviceMods.li2: Pricing changes: We may change our pricing structure. Existing customers are typically exempt from price increases, but we reserve the right to change prices for all customers with at least 30 days notice via email.
serviceMods.li3: Feature updates: We regularly improve our service with new features and enhancements. Some features may require plan upgrades.

dataOwnership.title: Data Ownership and Privacy
dataOwnership.yourRightsBody: You own 100% of your analytics data. We claim no intellectual property rights over your website data and will never sell or share it with third parties.
dataOwnership.dpaBodyPrefix: For enterprise customers and GDPR compliance, our comprehensive Data Processing Agreement (DPA) is available at
dataOwnership.dpaBodySuffix: . The DPA forms part of these Terms of Service and governs how we process data on your behalf.
dataOwnership.whatWeCollectBody: Our service is designed to be privacy-first and cookieless. We collect only anonymous, aggregated data as detailed in our Privacy Policy. We do not collect personally identifiable information.
dataOwnership.yrLi1: Ensure your use of our service complies with all applicable privacy laws (GDPR, CCPA, etc.)
dataOwnership.yrLi2: Update your privacy policy to mention the use of Betterlytics for anonymous analytics (note: no cookie consent banner is typically required since our service is cookieless)
dataOwnership.yrLi3: Do not attempt to send sensitive information (credit cards, personal data, etc.) through our service, including in URL paths or query parameters.
dataOwnership.yrLi4: Maintain security of your account and immediately report any unauthorized access
dataOwnership.ocLi1: Process your data only as described in our Privacy Policy
dataOwnership.ocLi2: Implement appropriate security measures to protect your data
dataOwnership.ocLi3: Never sell, share, or monetize your analytics data
dataOwnership.ocLi4: Provide EU-based hosting and processing for GDPR compliance
dataOwnership.ocLi5: Delete your data immediately upon account deletion

sla.title: Service Level and Support
sla.availabilityBody: We strive for high availability but provide the service on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We make no guarantees about uptime, though we work hard to maintain reliable service.
sla.supportBody: Technical support is provided via email on a reasonable effort basis. We aim to respond promptly but do not guarantee specific response times.
sla.bugsBody: We test our features extensively, but no software is perfect. We track reported bugs and prioritize fixes, especially for security or privacy issues. Not all reported bugs will be fixed immediately.

liability.title: Liability and Disclaimers
liability.p1: You expressly understand and agree that Betterlytics shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or exemplary damages, including but not limited to:
liability.li1: Loss of profits, goodwill, use, data, or other intangible losses
liability.li2: The use or inability to use our services
liability.li3: Unauthorized access to or alteration of your data
liability.li4: Statements or conduct of any third party
liability.li5: Any other matter relating to these Terms or our services
liability.note: What this means: While we work hard to provide reliable, privacy-focused analytics, technology isn't perfect and things can go wrong. By using Betterlytics, you understand that we can't be held responsible for any business losses or problems that might result from service issues. We're committed to earning your trust through transparency, strong security practices, and putting your privacy first.
liability.p2: This agreement shall be governed by the laws of the European Union and the jurisdiction where Betterlytics is legally established.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.li1: Your content: You retain all rights to any content you provide to our service. Your website data remains yours.
ip.li2: Our service: The look, feel, and functionality of Betterlytics is our intellectual property. You may not copy, modify, or reverse engineer our service.
ip.li3: Feedback: If you provide feedback or suggestions about our service, you agree that we may use and incorporate that feedback without payment or attribution.
ip.li4: Trademarks: "Betterlytics" and our logo are our trademarks. You may not use them without written permission, except to identify our service in connection with your legitimate use.
ip.li5: Open source components: Our analytics script and core components are released under open source licenses. This does not grant rights to our hosted service, trademarks, or proprietary infrastructure.

updates.title: Updates and Communication
updates.p1: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. When we make significant changes:
updates.li1: We will notify you via email at least 30 days in advance
updates.li2: We will post updates on our website
updates.li3: Continued use of our service after changes take effect constitutes acceptance
updates.li4: If you don't agree with changes, you may cancel your account

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.lead: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
contact.footer1: ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡º Made and hosted in the European Union

scope.title: Scope of This DPA
scope.body: This Data Processing Agreement applies exclusively to the Betterlytics hosted cloud service available at betterlytics.io and our official domains. It does not apply to self-hosted installations of our open source software. If you self-host Betterlytics, you are responsible for your own data processing agreements and legal compliance.

whyDifferent.title: Why This DPA Is Different
whyDifferent.body: Unlike traditional analytics services, Betterlytics is designed to be anonymous-by-design. We process no personal data, making this one of the simplest DPAs in the analytics industry.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.p1: This Data Processing Agreement ("DPA") forms part of the Betterlytics Terms of Service and governs the processing of data when you use our analytics service. This agreement is designed to ensure compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.
intro.p2: Important: Betterlytics is specifically designed to process only anonymous, aggregated data. No personal data is collected, stored, or processed by our service.

definitions.title: 2. Definitions
definitions.controller: "Data Controller": You (the customer) who determines the purposes and means of processing data from your website visitors.
definitions.processor: "Data Processor": Betterlytics, who processes data on your behalf according to your instructions.
definitions.processing: "Processing": In our case, the collection and analysis of anonymous, aggregated website analytics data.
definitions.personalData: "Personal Data": Not applicable - Betterlytics is designed to avoid processing any personal data.

processingDetails.title: 3. Data Processing Details
processingDetails.npLi1: Providing anonymous website analytics and visitor insights
processingDetails.npLi2: Generating aggregated reports on website traffic and usage patterns
processingDetails.npLi3: Detecting and filtering bot traffic for accurate statistics
processingDetails.catLi1: Anonymized IP addresses (last octet removed immediately)
processingDetails.subjectsBody: Not applicable - our system is designed to prevent identification of individual data subjects. All data is processed in aggregate and anonymous form only.
processingDetails.locationBody: All data processing occurs within the European Union on servers located in secure EU data centers.

instructions.title: 4. Your Instructions
instructions.intro: By using Betterlytics, you instruct us to:
instructions.li1: Collect anonymous analytics data from your website visitors
instructions.li2: Process this data to generate website analytics and insights
instructions.li3: Store the data for the duration of your subscription
instructions.li4: Delete all data immediately upon account deletion
instructions.li5: Provide you with analytics reports and access to your data

security.title: 5. Security Measures
security.intro: Betterlytics implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure data security:
security.li1: All data transmission encrypted using TLS 1.2/1.3
security.li2: Data at rest encrypted using industry-standard encryption
security.li3: Access controls limiting data access to authorized personnel only
security.li5: EU-based servers in secure data centers
security.li6: Immediate IP anonymization at data collection point

subprocessors.title: 6. Subprocessors
subprocessors.intro: Betterlytics may engage the following categories of subprocessors:
subprocessors.li1: Infrastructure providers: EU-based cloud hosting and infrastructure services
subprocessors.notice: We will notify you of any changes to our subprocessors and obtain your consent where required by law.

rights.title: 7. Data Subject Rights
rights.body: Not applicable: Since Betterlytics processes only anonymous data, individual data subject rights (access, rectification, erasure, etc.) do not apply to our analytics data. Visitors cannot be identified in our system, making individual rights requests impossible to fulfill.

breach.title: 8. Data Breach Notification
breach.intro: In the unlikely event of a security incident affecting our service:
breach.li1: We will notify you within 72 hours of becoming aware of any incident
breach.li2: We will provide details of the incident and our response measures
breach.li3: We will assist with any required notifications to data protection authorities
breach.li4: Note: Risk to individuals is minimal given our anonymous-only data processing

deletion.title: 9. Data Deletion and Return
deletion.accountBody: All data (personal and analytics) is permanently deleted immediately upon account deletion.
deletion.subscriptionBody: Analytics data is retained for 1 month in case you return, then permanently deleted.
deletion.exportBody: You can export your analytics data at any time through your dashboard.

compliance.title: 10. Audits and Compliance
compliance.li1: Regular internal security and privacy assessments
compliance.li2: Transparent, open-source codebase for technical verification
compliance.li3: Public privacy policy and terms of service
compliance.li4: Commitment to cooperate with reasonable audit requests from enterprise customers

contact.title: Contact for DPA Matters
contact.lead: For questions about this DPA or data processing practices:
contact.footer: This DPA is automatically accepted when you use Betterlytics and forms part of our Terms of Service. ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡º Anonymous-by-design analytics - Made and hosted in the European Union

errors.CredentialsSignin: Invalid email or password. Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.default: An error occurred during sign in. Please try again.

register.title: Create your account
register.subtitle: Get started for free â€” set up your analytics in minutes

disabled.title: Registration Disabled
disabled.description: Registration is currently disabled on this instance.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a password reset link

invalid.title: Invalid Reset Link
invalid.description: This password reset link is invalid or missing a token.
invalid.note: Please request a new password reset link.

expired.title: Reset Link Expired
expired.description: This password reset link has expired or is invalid.
expired.info: Password reset links expire after 1 hour for security reasons. Please request a new one.

invalid.title: Invalid Verification Link
invalid.description: The verification link is invalid or missing. Please check your email and try again.

failed.title: Verification Failed
failed.expiredInfo: Verification links expire after 24 hours for security. You can request a new one and try again.

verifyEmail.helpLine: Need help? Contact support at support@betterlytics.io

seo.title: Betterlytics | Simple, Cookieless, Privacy-Friendly Web Analytics
seo.description: Betterlytics is a privacy-first Google Analytics alternative. Get GDPR-compliant, cookieless insights without invasive tracking. Simple, open-source, and easy to use.

hero.badge: Open Source â€¢ GDPR Compliant â€¢ Cookieless
hero.description: Get powerful insights without compromising your users' privacy. GDPR-compliant, cookieless analytics that respects user privacy while delivering the data you need.

framework.title: Works with your favorite tools
framework.subtitle: Universal compatibility - works with any website, framework, or platform
framework.footer: And countless more... If it runs on the web, we support it!

principles.subtitle: Real-time insights, lightning-fast performance, and complete privacy compliance for everyone

euGdpr.title: EU-Based & GDPR Compliant
euGdpr.description: Servers hosted in the EU with strict data protection standards. Complete GDPR compliance with anonymous data collection and robust privacy safeguards.

noConsent.title: No Consent Banner Required
noConsent.description: Fully anonymous analytics mean no cookie banners, no GDPR consent forms, no user friction. Just install and start tracking immediately.

dataOwnership.title: Complete Data Ownership
dataOwnership.description: Your data stays yours forever. Self-host with our open-source version or use our secure cloud infrastructure.

realtime.title: Real-time Business Insights
realtime.description: Lightning-fast visitor tracking and conversion analytics worldwide. Beautiful dashboards help you make data-driven decisions instantly.

lightweight.title: Lightweight & Developer-Friendly
lightweight.description: Under 1KB script, open-source codebase, and comprehensive APIs. Built by developers, for developers.

simpleSetup.title: Simple Setup, Powerful Features
simpleSetup.description: One-line integration for any website. Advanced customization options and enterprise-grade features available.

showcase.subtitle: Explore the full arsenal of analytics capabilities

integration.subtitle: Add our lightweight script and start collecting cookieless, privacy-friendly analytics immediately. No cookies, no personal data, no consent banners required.

script.title: Simple Script Tag
script.description: Add one line to your HTML and start tracking immediately. Works with any website or CMS.

framework.title: Framework Ready
framework.description: Native support for React, Next.js, Vue, and other modern frameworks with TypeScript.

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted Option
selfHosted.description: Deploy on your own infrastructure with Docker for complete data ownership and control.

integration.footer: Detailed installation instructions for all platforms and frameworks

openSource.subtitle: Transparent, community-driven development. Join our contributors, request features, or adapt the platform to your unique requirements.

pricing.subtitle: Traffic-based plans that matches your growth. Start free, scale as you grow.
pricing.footer: Start with our free plan - no credit card required.

advancedFilters.title: Advanced Filters
advancedFilters.description: Slice and dice your analytics data by any dimension to uncover actionable insights.

trafficSources.title: Traffic Sources
trafficSources.description: Discover where your visitors are arriving from and optimize your marketing efforts.

funnels.title: Funnels
funnels.description: Track the conversion rate of your website's key user journeys.

events.title: Real-time Events
events.description: Track every user interaction as it happens with detailed event logging.

journeys.title: User Journeys
journeys.description: Track multiple user paths and see how visitors navigate through your site.

worldMap.title: Geographical Analytics
worldMap.description: See where your visitors are coming from around the world.

footer.blurb: Privacy-first web analytics for the modern web. GDPR compliant, cookieless, and open source.
footer.copyright: Â© {year} Betterlytics. All rights reserved. Open source under AGPL-3.0 license.

descriptions.growth: Perfect for small websites and personal projects

sidebar.activeUsers: {count, plural, =0 {active users} one {active user} other {active users}}

trends.adjustTimeRange: Try adjusting the time range or filters

log.realTimeDesc: Events will appear here in real-time as they occur
log.title: Event Log

table.noEventsDesc: No custom events were tracked during this time period. Events will appear here once they start being recorded.

create.description: Create a new funnel for your website.
create.name: Name

geography.noData: No geographic data available for the selected period

userJourney.noData: No journey data available for the selected criteria.

integration.title: Website Integration
integration.description: Add the tracking script to your website to start collecting analytics data
integration.headSectionNote: Add this script to the {head} section of your root layout or individual pages.
integration.npmPackageNote: Or install our <npm>npm</npm> package <package>@betterlytics/tracker</package> for easy setup for Node projects.

noDataBanner.title: Integration Required
noDataBanner.description: Your dashboard is ready, but we're not receiving any analytics data yet. Complete the integration setup to start tracking visitors.

banner.title: Please verify your email address
banner.body: Hi {name}! We sent a verification email to {email}. Please click the link in the email to verify your account.
banner.sentLabel: Email sent! Please check your inbox.
banner.help: Can't find the email? Check your spam folder or wait a few minutes for delivery.
banner.toastSuccess: Verification email sent! Please check your inbox.
